Job Title: Chief Technology Officer

Location: Atlanta Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Design, Engineering

Description:
Chief Technology Officer (CTO)

Job Specification: 

About the Company:
Design Manager, Inc., is the leading provider of project management, accounting, procurement, and payment capabilities (vertical ERP) tailored specifically for growing professional interior design firms. With thousands of active and long-term customers, the company is at the forefront of technological innovation in the design industry recently releasing its latest solutions to a market of over 250,000 firms in the United States. Our platform streamlines project management, client collaboration, and financial oversight, enabling designers to focus on what they do best: creating beautiful spaces. As a company committed to empowering design professionals with the latest technology, Design Manager, is poised for rapid growth with the recent backing of Performant Capital. We are seeking a visionary and execution proven Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to lead our technology organization, drive our innovation, and help scale our solutions to meet our ambitious growth plans. Join us in transforming the way designers manage their projects and business, making design accessible and business management seamless.

About the Role:
We are seeking a dynamic Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to lead our technology and SaaS product capabilities, driving the development and execution of our technical vision and strategy. As a member of the Executive Leadership Team - reporting directly to the CEO - the CTO will play a critical role in aligning our technology and product efforts with the company's strategic objectives, fostering innovation, and building a high-performing team.

Key Responsibilities:
Shape and Drive the Technical Vision: As a key player in our executiveleadership team, you'll have the opportunity to craft and execute a compelling technical vision and strategy that aligns perfectly with Design Manager’s ambitious objectives. Your strategic insight will pave the way for innovative solutions that keep us at the forefront of the design industry.
● Lead with Inspiration: Take the helm of our software engineering, qualityassurance, and cloud operations teams, guiding them with inspirationalleadership. Your ability to motivate and direct our talented team members iscrucial to transforming our technical vision into reality, ensuring we deliverexceptional value to our customers.
● Cultivate a Culture of Innovation and Excellence: Attracting, mentoring, and retaining top talent is at the heart of this role. You will build a thrivingenvironment that promotes innovation, reliability, and accountability, shaping a team that's not just equipped for today's challenges but is also resilient andadaptable for the future.
● Champion Collaboration and Cohesion: You will be the linchpin in fostering collaboration across the functional groups within Design Manager. By clearly communicating and executing the technology strategy your leadership will help ensure that every function moves in harmony towards shared success.
● Lead Modernization and Technological Advancements: Spearhead ourmodernization efforts and execute on a strategic technological roadmap thatensures Design Manager remains a leader in design business managementsolutions. Your guidance in implementing CI/CD and test automation processes will enhance our development lifecycle, setting new standards for quality and efficiency.
● Evaluate and Maximize Technical Investments: Your keen insight andexperience will be invaluable in assessing technical investments andpartnerships, making strategic decisions that maximize benefits for thecompany. Your expertise will ensure that every investment and partnershipaligns with our long-term vision and delivers tangible value.
● Optimize for Operational Excellence: You will optimize engineering andoperations metrics, ensuring that our teams not only meet but exceed SLAs and performance standards. Your focus on operational excellence will ensurereliability and scalability, underpinning the trust our customers place in Design Manager.
Desired Qualifications:
● Referenceable experience in leading high-performing engineering teams infast-growing software (SaaS) companies backed by private equity/venturecapital investors.
● Demonstrable expertise in agile engineering and DevOps practices, with astrong foundation in modern development frameworks.
● Demonstrated success in team management, meeting key milestones without compromising quality or security.
● Recent experience with offshoring and building effective, distributed teams.
● Deep knowledge of application architecture, with a track record of optimizing critical infrastructure and applications.
● Familiarity with security and compliance standards (SOC, ISO, PCI, etc.).
● Proven ability to manage multiple projects under tight deadlines.
Personal Characteristics:
● A curious, ambitious leader motivated by challenges and committed to building a great company.
● Exceptional ability to inspire and relate to diverse teams and stakeholders.
● Strategic thinker with a hands-on approach and a deep customer focus.
● Strong leadership skills, capable of attracting and mentoring top talent.
● Entrepreneurial spirit, driven by innovation and growth.
● Excellent organizational and problem-solving abilities, comfortable managing ambiguity.
● Outstanding communication skills, able to present and lead discussionseffectively across all levels of the organization.
● Unwavering integrity, credibility, and ethical standards.
Our Technology Environment
● Restful C# and SQL Server on backend● React/HTML/JS on frontend● Microsoft Azure with some legacy data center infrastructure● Emerging adoption of serverless and microservice architectures
Our Technology Team
● 12 total team members (remote)○ 5 Backend Engineers (2 - US East Coast, 3 - Argentina)○ 4 Frontend Engineers (1 - US East Coast, 3 - Argentina)○ 2 Quality Assurance (Argentina)○ 1 Scrum Master (US East Coast)

Experience Level (if available): Executive
